OOC: Irony, good memorie and an idea. I wanted to created a blind 
character a year ago more or less but I didn't know what would be his 
beast mode I just knew that I liked a Pred. I didn't know how named 
him and I named him Perceptor 'cause I remembered that in other 
cartoon a blind character had "Perceptor" for name, and I remembered 
too that moles are almost blind. So my character would be a 
trasnmetal mole, then I've remembered that an autobot had that name 
and I thought that that would be a cool irony if that character would 
have technicals skills.

BIC:

Perceptor, couldn't avoid the shots and was hit for them. He fell 
wounded and quickly changed to vehicle mode, he knew that in that 
mode he could activate his internal repair system while he moved 
trying to avoid others attacks


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> SS fired 8 lasers at Perceptor.
> 
> OOC: I saw the movie and Perceptor was a good guy.  Explaination 
> please?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael sent a massive bolt of light straight at Perceptor. The 
> battle 
> > was tight and he knew they'd have to pull out before long. Shadow 
> Star 
> > seemed battle-worn and it was obvious he needed some repairs.
> > 
> > Tyrael: Come and get this, Predafreaks!
> > 
> > Burrock lanced out with his tentacles, trying to reach for

> > or Quickstrike.

hit

back,
